title: AMA Oscar

replies.body: What are your opinions on Avicus Network and me?  What about the whole staff team?
replies.body_tagged: What are your opinions on Avicus Network and me?  What about the whole staff team?

replies.body:
I think its a good and underatted server  which should be bigger than it is ;) From what little I know of you you seem like a very reliable mod and a great name ;)


Staffteam wise, there moderating skills are great but I have some problems with a few of them but there not to do with avicus so I wont say them but overall I think the staff team is decent! :)

replies.body: Hey, well I don't rly know where, I met your on the like the first day on avicus and I called you out for hacking on Control the hill lol, didn't speak to you for like a year after that, then I joined ts.<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">From what I remember you hated me for a while but since then I've got to know u way better and your one of the best players on avicus and overall a really nice person
